entry.string: Unable to create gap in tree for comment insertion! Comments table has possibly been corrupted.
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu creete-a gep in tree-a fur cumment insershun! Cumments teble-a hes pusseebly beee curroopted. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Please seek help on the public-developer list xaraya_public-dev@xaraya.com, or in the #support channel on Xaraya's IRC network.
entry.translation: Pleese-a seek help oon zee poobleec-defeluper leest xaraya_public-dev@xaraya.com, oor in zee #support chunnel oon Xereya's IRC netvurk.
